Title_Parsed: Intern - Digital Media and Traditional Press
Responsibilities: performing other press and administrative tasks
Qualifications: familiarity with programs such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop
ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Cleaned_Text: The House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform Democrats seek two motivated and reliable students to fill two full-time Digital Media and Traditional Press Intern positions this Summer. The intern responsibilities include, but are not limited to, written content creation, graphic design, video editing, and performing other press and administrative tasks as necessary. Successful candidates will possess familiarity with programs such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign, Canva, as well as compiling and interpreting social media analytics. Ability to work in a fast-paced, rapid response environment and willingness to learn are a must. This position is an integral part of the Communications Team and reports to the Communications Director. Candidates with diverse backgrounds and experiences are strongly encouraged to apply. To apply, please send a resume, cover letter, and portfolio to oversightpress@mail.house.gov.
